title: An Amazing 300 Perch Property, Situated In The Ever Popular Kosgoda Area - LIP 081
details:
LIP-081 An amazing 300 perch property, situated in the ever popular Kosgoda area, ideally priced to sell and ready for development. The land , with a clear title, is 200 meters from the Galle main road, 2.5 km from the Heritance hotel with the Dusit Thani resort also being close by. The property, which has its full length on an estuary which is navigable for kilometers, is just 50 meters from the beach with beautiful sea views.

There is currently a small house on the property , used by a watchman and the property is connected to municipal water and electricity. This property is ideal for a hotel development or an exclusive gated villa community. The price of this property is set in order for it to move quickly with other beach land in this area selling at a much higher rate. Hotel developers are encouraged to contact us early for an appointment to view. This property will not be on the market long.
